item.title: Trump says Hamas should free all hostages by midday Saturday or 'let hell break out'
item.description: President Donald Trump said on Monday that Hamas should release all hostages held by the militant group in Gaza by midday Saturday or he would propose...

item.title: Trump signs order pausing enforcement of foreign bribery ban
item.description: The Foreign Corrupt Practices Act became law in 1977. In 2024, the Department of Justice announced 24 cases related to the anti-bribery statute.

item.title: Supreme Court lawyer Tom Goldstein jailed as flight risk after cryptocurrency hiding claim
item.description: SCOTUSblog publisher Tom Goldstein was indicted in January on charges alleging he failed to declare millions of dollars in poker winnings.

item.title: Trump removes director of government ethics office
item.description: President Donald Trump removed David Huitema as director of the U.S. Office of Government Ethics, the agency said.

item.title: Man pleads guilty in hack of SEC's X account that claimed approval of bitcoin ETFs
item.description: The price of bitcoin rose more than $1,000 after the January 2024 hack of the X account of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.
